Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2015 08:13AM - edited Jul 3, 2015 08:14AM by Jujube2 I remember my dogs got really trim three years ago when I was waiting for my test results!! And one of them is a bulldog. ;) I took many many long walks with them. I just tried to stay busy...difficult I know!! This part, I thought, was the most difficult part of the entire process. Best advice I got was " put one foot in front of the other' and I prayed a lot!!!
